01mg.title: Maze generator
01mg.text: A maze generator using a recursive backtracking algorithm. It even works for 3D Mazes. You can set the size of the maze, and the algortihm will generate a solvable maze.

02tr.title: Trocket
02tr.text: A client querying the Everbase API using React and Apollo. You can search for any Alpha2Codes and get infos about the given Country.

03co.title: Colorgame
03co.text: A short weekend project written in Javascript. The goal is to guess the right color based on the hexadecimal color.

04ev.title: Evolution
04ev.text: An evolution-simulator written in p5.js. The yellow dots are food for the triangles. The strongest triangles are the most likely to reproduce with slightly different abilities. The triangles have properties like speed and agility which are random generated. (Demo only works in Chrome)
